Weapon.Name: Bronze Spear
Weapon.Description: A simple spear, topped with a bronze tip.
Weapon.FlavorText: The spear has been used as a thrusting weapon for ages, providing reach to strike at the enemy first.

Weapon.Name: Short Bow
Weapon.Description: A simple, albeit primitive short bow. Made of a flexable wooden shaft and a sinew bowstring.
Weapon.FlavorText: Bows like this were taking down small game centuries ago. Simple to make, maintain, and carry.

Weapon.Name: Sling
Weapon.Description: A simple, albeit primitive sling. Made of braided flax.
Weapon.FlavorText: Slings have been mentioned even in the most ancient texts as weapons of sheperds and soldiers.

Weapon.Name: Wooden Sword
Weapon.Description: A simple wooden sword. Full of spliters.
Weapon.FlavorText: Swords like these are used by youth to build strong muscles.

Weapon.Name: Wooden Cudgel
Weapon.Description: A simple wooden club. Design unchanged for centuries.
Weapon.FlavorText: When all else fails, beating ones enemies senseless with a wooden stick is a crude but effective tactic.

Weapon.Name: Great Axe
Weapon.Description: A sturdy oak shaft connected to a doubled bladed sharpened head.
Weapon.FlavorText: Famously used by the barbarian nations to the north to great effect.

Potion.Name: Minor Health Potion
Potion.ItemDescription: Drinking will restore your health slightly.
Potion.FlavorText: Distilled by a junior alchemist, this potion is dark brown in color and smells of cinnamon.

Potion.Name: Haste Potion
Potion.ItemDescription: Drinking will speed you up for a short time.
Potion.FlavorText: This extract from a rare jungle plant will increase your movements and reflexes for a short time. Some have become addicted to the rush, and its sale is restricted in many areas.

Potion.Name: Minor Mana Potion
Potion.ItemDescription: Drinking will increase your mana somewhat.
Potion.FlavorText: Hundreds of lightning bugs are harvested during the nights of spring and are condensed into this blue syrup.

Scroll.Name: Scroll of Haste
Scroll.ItemDescription: Reading this scroll will warp time for a short period of time, speeding your actions.
Scroll.FlavorText: The text of this scroll is blury and hard to keep in focus.
